verbose_text: Interestingly, miR-126 is transferred from apoptotic endothelial cells via microvesicles, which allows cell-to-cell communication and reduces atherosclerosis and suppresses chemokine CXCL12.
evidence: miR-126 is transferred from apoptotic endothelial cells via microvesicles, which allows cell-to-cell communication and reduces atherosclerosis and suppresses chemokine CXCL12
